Description:
Detects disabling Windows Defender Tamper Protection

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Disable Tamper Protection on Windows Defender
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((target_object like '%\microsoft\windows defender\features\tamperprotection%' and details = 'dword (0x00000000)') and  not (process_path = 'c:\program files\windows defender\msmpeng.exe' or (process_path like 'c:\programdata\microsoft\windows defender\platform\%' and process_path like '%\msmpeng.exe')))
